Test Steps: Agree to the Terms of use.
Proceed to Create a new wallet.
Allow MetaMask to gather usage data.
Create a password for your MetaMask wallet.
Watch the secure your wallet video.
Expected Result:
The video plays.
The video is audible.
Subtitles are shown in the video.

Test Steps: Proceed with the recommended action to secure you wallet.

Notes: Take a note of the 12-word phrase.

Test Steps: Proceed through the onboarding completion screens.

Expected Result:
The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.
